# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(vulkan-sdk LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_custom_target(vulkan-sdk)

# target
add_executable(zxengine "")
set_target_properties(zxengine PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "zxengine")
set_target_properties(zxengine PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/debug")
add_dependencies(zxengine vulkan-sdk)
target_precompile_headers(zxengine PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/zxengine/windows/x64/debug/__/__/CPPScripts/pubh.h>
)
target_include_directories(zxengine PRIVATE
    ../../Vendor/Include
    ../../Vendor/Include/Vulkan
)
target_compile_definitions(zxengine PRIVATE
    UNICODE
)
target_compile_options(zxengine PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/GS>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/GS>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Gd>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Gd>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Zc:preprocessor>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Zc:preprocessor>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(zxengine PRIVATE -W0)
else()
    target_compile_options(zxengine PRIVATE -w)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(zxengine PRIVATE /EHsc-)
elseif(Clang)
    target_compile_options(zxengine PRIVATE -fno-cxx-exceptions)
else()
    target_compile_options(zxengine PRIVATE -fno-exceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(zxengine PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(zxengine PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(zxengine PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(zxengine PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(zxengine PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(zxengine PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET zxengine PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDebugDLL")
endif()
target_link_libraries(zxengine PRIVATE
    assimp-vc143-mt
    freetype
    glfw3
    irrKlang
    opengl32
    Shell32
    vulkan-1
)
target_link_directories(zxengine PRIVATE
    ../../Vendor/Libs
)
target_sources(zxengine PRIVATE
    ../../CPPScripts/Animation/Animation.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Animation/AnimationController.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Animation/NodeAnimation.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Audio/AudioClip.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Audio/AudioEngine.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Audio/AudioStream.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Component/Animator.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Component/AudioListener.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Component/AudioSource.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Component/Component.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Component/GameLogic.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Component/Light.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Component/MeshRenderer.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Component/ParticleSystem.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Component/Physics/BoxCollider.cpp

    ../../CPPScripts/Component/Physics/Collider.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Component/Physics/PlaneCollider.cpp
    ../../CPPScripts/Component/Physics/SphereCollider.cpp
